SEARCH
Package org.mvplugins.multiverse.core.utils.result

Interface Result<S extends SuccessReason,F extends FailureReason>

Type Parameters:
S - The type of success reason.
F - The type of failure reason.
All Known Implementing Classes:
Result.Failure, Result.Success
public sealed interface Result<S extends SuccessReason,F extends FailureReason> permits Result.Success<S,F>, Result.Failure<S,F>
Represents result of an operation with a reason for success or failure that has localized messages.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static final class 
    Result.Failure<S extends SuccessReason,F extends FailureReason>
    The class for a failed result.
    static final class

    The class for a successful result.

      Type Parameters:
      F - The type of failure reason.
      S - The type of success reason.
      Parameters:
      successReason - The reason for success.
      message - The custom message for success. This will override the default message.

      The new success result.
